Class ShowSeating

java.lang.Object
ShowSeating
public class ShowSeating extends Object
This class represents the currently booked seating for a given show in a given theater.
Version:
2023.05.05
Author:
Max, Nathaniel, and Salvatore

    • getTheater

      Accessor method for theater.
      Returns:
      theater.

    • numFreeSeats

      public int numFreeSeats()
      Returns the number of free seats for this show in this theater.
      Returns:
      the number of free seats.

    • acceptReservation

      public boolean acceptReservation(int rowIndex, ArrayList<Integer> seatIndexes)
      Reserves a seat by setting its value in availableSeats to false. If the seat was already reserved, the reservation fails.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the index of the row where seats are being reserved.
      seatIndexes - the index of the seats that are being reserved.

    • getFreeRows

      public ArrayList<Integer> getFreeRows()
      Returns a list of the indexes of rows with available seats.
      Returns:
      a list of the indexes of rows with available seats.

    • getFreeSeats

      public ArrayList<Integer> getFreeSeats(int rowIndex)
      Returns a list of the indexes of available seats within a row.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the index of the row being checked.
      Returns:
      a list of the indexes of available seats.

    • xFreeSeats

      public ArrayList<Integer> xFreeSeats(int x)
      Checks the seating for x adjoining seats.
      Parameters:
      x - the number of adjoining seats.
      Returns:
      the list of row numbers that contain x adjoining seats. If no row contains x adjoining seats, then null is returned.
